item.title: DMRG++ Tutorial Materials
item.description: Slides and inputs for the DMRG 101 Introduction to Theory and Practice tutorial have been posted to the below URL. Thanks to all who attended!

item.title: DMRG 101 Tutorial
item.description:
Title: Density Matrix Renormalization Group 101: Introduction to Theory and Practice
When: Fri, Aug 12, 2016
Where: Oak Ridge National Laboratory, Oak Ridge, TN, USA
There is no cost but registration is required. Here is the official announcement and agenda.

item.title: Website Layout Changes
item.description: Pull down menues have been removed. Please use left navigation links. Website should be more friendly to mobile users
